attributes.action: allow air rifle and BB gun safety to be taught in all schools to prevent further harm to our children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the past few months, there has been a dramitic increase in incidents involving school children being shot at with either pellet or BB guns whilst at school, some instances have involved seriously injured. I am proposing that schools run safety talks as part of their curriculum for parents and children by suitably qualified instructors to educate them in the dangers of using these "toys" whilst at school or in their free time. I urge you to sign this petition so that we can reduce the number of our children being seriously injured on a daily basis.
